lines.text: There's a certain shabby nobility in failing all by myself.

[voice over]
You are not the kind of guy who would be at a place like this at this time of the morning and, though the details are fuzzy, you cannot say that the terrain is entirely unfamiliar.

[rambling on aimlessly to himself]
... Siamese fighting fish in the water cooler... the old crew in the golden days of this magazine would have thought of it.

[reads paper in typewriter]
Yeah! "Dead Amanda"! I told ya, you get more nookie than you can shake a fucking stick at if you just told people your wife was dead.
